PARSE_MOUNT.description: Configure Parse API route. (Do not change this value)

APP_ID.description: A unique identifier for your app.

MASTER_KEY.description: A key that overrides all permissions. Keep this secret.

SERVER_URL.description: Replace yourappname with the name typed above in app-name

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Your AWS access key for S3 bucket access

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Your AWS secret access key S3 bucket access

BUCKET_NAME.description: Your S3 bucket name (This is required if AWS keys were provided)
